name: Leafed Away Demo
description:
-about

Leafed Away is side-scrolling game set in an underground world. Join Tim's adventure as he tries to find his way out while fighting monsters, meeting new people and making important decisions.

-devnote's

So since I've always wanted to make a metroidvania I thought It be pretty cool to make a game of this genre. Inspirations  of this genre were: Super Metroid, Castlevania: Symphony of the Night  Cave Story, Metroid Fusion, Castlevania: Aria of Sorrow, Guacamelee! etc.. Currently the game is in development but you can try this little demo.

-controlls

S    -      jump

D    -      shoot

I       -  inventory

Arrows   -   move

1,2,3...  -     switch weapons

-credits

everything done by:

bleart nurednin (blikzz)

    MINIMUM:
    • OS:Windows XP
    • Processor: Intel Core Solo
    • Memory: 128 MB RAM
    • Graphics: 64MB RAM
    • Hard Drive: 50MB space
